column4: Hi I have installed Ubuntu(actualy kubuntu) on my laptop and it worked great until yesterday when I turned it off instead of showing a konsole after closing X there was just a bunch of different colours, today X crashed and the screen showed a stripe pattern with colours, anyone know what can cause this ? it doesn't seem like a healthy sign :)
I don't want to go back to WinXP again
